channel.title: NPC facing player
channel.description: I no theres player facing NPC but does anyone have a code so that the npcs face the player?

item.title: NPC facing player
item.dc:creator: @krawks12 krawks12
item.description:
@krawks12 wrote:

what do you mean if you want it to make sense?(i havent tried the code yet seeing as ive been at skool all day but am about to try what rodent said)[br][size=1]Posted at: September 27, 2006, 07:14:25 PM[/size][hr]it didnt work i just get an error

NPC.java:71: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable playerID
location: class NPC
if(dirUpdateRequired) updateMask |= 32768 + playerID;
^
NPC.java:71: operator + cannot be applied to int,playerID
if(dirUpdateRequired) updateMask |= 32768 + playerID;
^
NPC.java:71: operator | cannot be applied to int,
if(dirUpdateRequired) updateMask |= 32768 + playerID;
^
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[br][size=1]Posted at: September 27, 2006, 07:17:01 PM[/size][hr]um maybe its just me but isnt scape rune like not a server?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 28, 2006, 06:44:52 AM[/size][hr]oh wait nvm

item.title: NPC facing player
item.dc:creator: @animalnt animalnt
item.description:
@animalnt wrote:

or if you want it to make sense, in your attack gfx or if you are using magic, add this in the void:

teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absy:

Read full topic

item.title: NPC facing player
item.dc:creator: @rodent rodent
item.description:
@rodent wrote:

if you want the NPC to face a player whose index is playerID, the direction update block for the NPC has to be: 32768 + playerID. (taken from scaperune)

Read full topic
